author: @nillionnetwork
@nillionnetwork
text:
The future of health data is private with @HealthBlocks.

A gamified health app that turns steps into rewards, while keeping your data private with Nillion.

Our latest case study reveals how it works.

Readers unlock something special at the end 👇 https://t.co/IUBzY1HcVt

author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Every time you give up your data for free, someone else gets rich.

That’s why they tell you privacy doesn’t matter.

When you own your data, you own the value.

Nillion makes it possible ⚔️
